mapper.select: SELECT id FROM STAYPC_MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT email FROM STAYPC_MEMBER WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT into STAYPC_MEMBER(id, password, email, name, picture, regdate, VERIFY_EMAIL) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{picture}, sysdate ,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT email FROM STAYPC_MEMBER WHERE id=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password} AND VERIFY_EMAIL='Y'
SELECT * FROM STAYPC_MEMBER WHERE id=#{id} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.update: update STAYPC_MEMBER set VERIFY_EMAIL = 'Y' WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
update STAYPC_MEMBER set PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.delete: DELETE STAYPC_MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id} and PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.LODGE_CODE FROM STAYPC_LODGE a INNER JOIN STAYPC_LODGE_IMAGE b ON a.LODGE_CODE = b.LODGE_CODE INNER JOIN STAYPC_LODGE_BOOK c ON a.LODGE_CODE = c.LODGE_CODE WHERE id = #{id}
